title: Happy Valentine’s!
detail_text: <:th_ch0000/>Nico Nico Nii~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮 I’ll Nico Nico Nii your heart! 𝅘𝅥𝅮 Yazawa Nico will make you smile~𝅘𝅥𝅮 Call me Nico Nii! Love, Nico! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Huh!? Not again! Someone imitated my voice......!? That’s annoying but impressive...! I’m gonna catch you this time!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Oh, Nico-san!? What’s going on? It’s dangerous to run in the hallways.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Shizuku! Did you see who was imitating Nico!? It sounded like they ran past you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>......No, I have no clue at all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Let’s go catch them together! We might still be able to find them......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Nico-san. Let’s go to the clubroom instead. Riko-san and Kasumi-san brought tons of chocolate. I heard there are a lot of different flavors, like raspberry and orange peel. It sounds delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>But Nico is...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>They’re going to be waiting for you, Nico-san. They won’t start without you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Huh? Really? Well, waiting for Nico is not a great feeling. Nico has no choice, then! Let’s go, Shizuku!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Okay 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
